mapper.select: select id, name, `desc`, tag, total, discount, min, `limit`, type, status, goods_type, goods_value, code, time_type, days, start_time, end_time, add_time, update_time, deleted from litemall_coupon
select count(*) from litemall_collect where deleted = 0 and type = 0 and value_id = #{id}
mapper.update: update litemall_cart set deleted = 1 where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into litemall_cart (user_id, goods_id, goods_sn, goods_name, product_id, price, number, specifications, checked, update_time, pic_url) VALUES (#{userId}, #{goodsId}, #{goodsSn}, #{goodsName}, #{productId}, #{price}, #{number}, #{specifications,typeHandler=com.xjtuse.mall.datahandler.String2StringArray}, #{checked}, now(), #{picUrl})
insert into litemall_coupon_user (user_id, coupon_id, start_time, end_time, add_time, update_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{couponId}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, now(), now())
insert into litemall_collect (user_id, value_id, type, add_time, update_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{valueId}, #{type}, now(), now())
